content.question:
Given f(x) = <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML" aria-label="f of x equals x plus 1 for x less than 0, and cosine open parentheses pi times x close parentheses for x greater than or equal to 0">
 <semantics>
 <mrow><mo>{</mo> <mrow>
 <mtable columnalign="left">
 <mtr columnalign="left">
 <mtd columnalign="left">
 <mrow>
 <mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow>
 </mtd>
 <mtd columnalign="left">
 <mrow>
 <mtext>for </mtext><mi>x</mi><mo><</mo><mtext>0</mtext></mrow>
 </mtd>
 </mtr>
 <mtr columnalign="left">
 <mtd columnalign="left">
 <mrow>
 <mi>cos</mi><mi>π</mi></mrow>
 </mtd>
 <mtd columnalign="left">
 <mrow>
 <mtext>for </mtext><mi>x</mi><mo>≥</mo><mtext>0</mtext></mrow>
 </mtd>
 </mtr>

</mtable></mrow> </mrow>

 <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML" aria-label="the integral from negative 1 to 1 of f of x with respect to x equals">

</mstyle><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo><mi>d</mi><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo></mrow>
</math>
